ValidationRule.description: Tom Mullins team Members (Tom, Gerald O'Reilly, Russ DeLuca, Daniel Nimmer) must have a commission of 10%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Marketer_UW_Name__c = "003370000047Xtt", Marketer_UW_Name__c = "003370000069LwA", Marketer_UW_Name__c = "0033700000IXqHv", Marketer_UW_Name__c = "0033700000gpsds", Marketer_UW_Name__c = "0033700000R4VYL" ), Commission_Rate__c <> 0.10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tom Mullins team Members (Tom Mullins, Gerald O'Reilly, Russ DeLuca, Daniel Nimmer) must have a commission of 10% on Renewals
